message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_LOCATION_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on Location has been exceeded by %1n character(s).

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_CLOSED
message.locale: This Incident is closed, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This Incident is cancelled, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: This Incident has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_AUTHORISATION
message.locale: You do not have authorization to maintain this incident. Please contact the Social Enterprise Folder owner.
You do not have authorisation to maintain this incident. Please contact the Social Enterprise Folder owner.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_REPORTER_NOT_SET
message.locale: The reporter of the incident must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_CLOSURE_COMMENTS_NOT_SET
message.locale: Closure comments must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_CLOSUREREASON_NOT_SET
message.locale: Closure reason must be selected.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_TYPE_NOT_SET
message.locale: The type of incident must be selected.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_DATE_NOT_SET
message.locale: The date on which the incident occurred must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_LOCATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: The location of where the incident took place must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_DESCRIPTION_NOT_SET
message.locale: A description of the incident must be recorded.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_REPORTMETHOD_NOT_SET
message.locale: Method must be selected

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_AFFECTED_MEMBER_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: Affected Party must be selected.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_SENSITIVE
message.locale: You do not have access to this incident's details.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_SENSITIVITY_TOO_LOW
message.locale: The sensitivity selected is lower than one of the incident participants, it should be at least '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_SENSITIVITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: The sensitivity selected can not be validated, because the sensitivity for the current user can not be resolved. The error returned was '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_RECORDED_DATE_NOT_SET
message.locale: Recorded Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_SEVERITY_NOT_SET
message.locale: The severity of the incident must be selected.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_RECORDED_BY_NOT_SET
message.locale: Recorded By must be entered

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_STATUS_NOT_SET
message.locale: Status must be selected

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_LOCATION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Location entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Description entered, when appended to the existing description text, exceeds the maximum length. Text entered should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_CLOSURE_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: Closure comments entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_DATETIME_CANNOT_BE_IN_THE_FUTURE
message.locale: The date and time of the incident cannot be in the future.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_CANCELLED_CAN_NOT_BE_CLOSED
message.locale: The incident is cancelled and cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_FOR_DUPLICATE_CLIENT
message.locale: The incident cannot be created as this party is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_NO_REPORTERS_FOR_ANONYMOUS_INCIDENT
message.locale: The reporter of the incident may be anonymous or named, not both.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_FV_MANDATORY_SENSITIVITY_NOT_SET
message.locale: Sensitivity must be selected

message.name: INF_DESCRIPION_CREATED_BY
message.locale: Created by:

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XFV_TIME_AND_TIMEOFDAY_SET
message.locale: Incident time or time of day must be entered, not both.

message.name: ERR_INCIDENT_XRV_SENSITIVITY_GREATER_THAN_USER
message.locale: The incident sensitivity cannot be set to a level that is higher than your own.
